spiritsExplanation:
The workout "Four Types of Focus Row" combines elements that align with the "Flow & Rhythm" and "Outdoor & Adventure" spirits. The use of a steady interval format with a max rhythm of 26 suggests a focus on pacing and coordination, fitting the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit, corroborated by the dance and global hits music playlist that supports a rhythmic flow. This is scored at 0.7 for its clear alignment.

The image showing rowing on a river strongly indicates an "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit. This is matched with a score of 0.7, as the natural setting plays a crucial role in the workout's character.

The "Soothing & Restorative" spirit is mildly present with a score of 0.4 due to the "breathe" category and lower intensity, emphasizing a calming, focused breathing approach.

Other spirits like "High-Energy & Intense" were not selected due to the lower intensity rating and calm pacing indicated by the jog and run instructions.
